subject: Re: [junit] About Failing Tests and Stopping
msgSnippet: ... Your tests are too big. Write smaller tests. (Assuming you mean stops at the failed assertion . If the entire suite stops just because one test fails, you
messageBody:
On Tuesday 14 September 2004 08:37, love wrote:
> When My tsts fail, The tests Stop.
> How can I resume tests until Completion
> even if some Tests fail.Otherwise it stops at the failed test.

Your tests are too big. Write smaller tests.

(Assuming you mean "stops at the failed assertion". If the entire suite
stops just because one test fails, you have a more interesting problem.)

--
Chris "electric hedgehog" Dollin
